name: Make It England!
description:
Blaike Harnett is a student at Media Design School, Auckland studying and making good use of the magic of Game Art. Born a gamer in Rotorua, Bay of Plenty, Blaike is now bringing the games to you from Auckland City beginning with Make It England!

Should you like it, love it, or hate it, Blaike is eager to hear anything that you wish to ask or say about his game at blaike6258@gmail.com.
